entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Temiskaming Shores
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:34 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Local blowing snow early this evening. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near noon then cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
